channel.title: Using new font
channel.description:
I just recently added a new font for the new level up interface. Everything is added correctly. I added the font in the cache using Toms cache suite. How would I use the font in RSInterface.java? It's only numbers.
Here's an example: [code]addText(1197, "Level 0: Home Teleport", tda, 1, 0xFE981F, true, true);[/code]
I know the "1" changes the font. When I change it to 3, its the critical hit font and for 4, there's nothing. 5 just crashes the client because there is no font for it.
Client: Galkons Refactored

item.title: Using new font
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

The number represents the index in the Font[] that is set for the interface definitions.

Read full topic
